history.content:
There is no way for students to see their wait list position for the secondary section, only for the lecture (aka enrollment section).

If you are on the wait list and want to switch sections, then you need to drop the class and re-enroll into the lecture and new section. There is a risk that if you do this, you could drop to the end of the wait list if someone else gets to the open seats before you do. In that case, no one will help you regain your prior wait list position.

Once you are enrolled in the class, you CAN switch related sections without having to drop the class. Here's how to do it in CalCentral:

Go to My Academics > Class Enrollment > Class Adjustment and select “Options”. Keep in mind that switching sections within a class is different than doing a swap for a different class.

children.subject:
You will not be allowed to enroll into the lecture until there are seats available in both the lecture and the section you have selected. The lecture is considered the 'enrollment' section & whether you are actually enrolled or remain waitlisted is based on that section.

To answer your question more directly - by the time you're able to use the options button, you will already be enrolled in both the lecture and a section of the class. It simply isn't possible (aside from a rare system glitch) to be enrolled into the lecture but to be waitlisted for a section.

Once I'm enrolled in the lecture but waitlisted in the section, can I use the "Options" to waitlist to a different section?

Or do I need to be enrolled in both lecture and section to use the options?

Thank you!

history.content:
I can see my waitlist position for the lecture.

But is there a way to see my waitlist position for discussion if I'm waitlisted for both?

If I have a good chance of enrolling in the lecture, but the section is full, should I drop the class and waitlist again in a different section?

Is there a way to change the section waitlist without having to drop the whole class?
history.subject: Section Waitlist Position

history.content:
I can see my waitlist position for the lecture.
